column4: hi all, hoping someone can help me -im running Breezy on an HP compaq nx4300, and im a newbie (sorry1).  All is going smoothly, but i can get sound working.  Ive googled for days, but no solution works.  Any ideas?

i've treid totem, mplayer and the standard CD player and they all play the files/cd but no sound comes from the speakers.  I runa a dualboot setup, and the sound works in windows so i think it must be a driver issue
possibly a silly question, but have you fired up a mixer and made sure things aren't just set to 0 or muted?
